org.afree.ui
Interface GradientShaderFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardGradientShaderFactory
public interface GradientShaderFactory

The interface for a class that can transform a GradientPaint in some way.

Method Summary
 LinearGradient create(GradientColor paint, Shape target)
          Transforms a GradientPaint instance to "fit" some target shape.
 

Method Detail

create

LinearGradient create(GradientColor paint,
                      Shape target)
Transforms a GradientPaint instance to "fit" some target shape.

Parameters:
paint - the original paint.
target - the reference area.
Returns:
A transformed paint.
